input.sentences: we watched the giant parade go down the street .
there was so many costumes we saw .
some people were dressed up like the communist military .
then there were people dressed up in colonial outfits .
we saw some people watching the parade from the windows of the building .
output.sentences: It was nearing time for the city's annual Christmas parade.
A large group of costumed dancers, joined by green ribbon, led the parade.
Next in the parade was a large group of soldiers in uniform.
The most impressive uniforms were worn by the band.
Many citizens watched the parade from the vantage point of their apartment windows.
